msg: o Fixed the build problems we had on the bigbang branch with the last commit.
The server.xml file now contains all the beans necessary to initialize the DirectoryServer contextEntries
o Added some more tests into the ServerEntry API

o Fixed some tests to inject ServerEntry into the server instead of Attributes when creating partitions
